I reached out for my friend, to get her assistance
to walk up the aisle.

1507.66.text:
And as the two of us together were walking
up the aisle and got to the large corridor,

1513.87.text:
and I'm still blowing my nose and trying to
get over this gift, and I moved over to the

1519.79.text:
side a little bit and my friend looked at
me and she said, "I need to go to the restroom,

1527.11.text: I said, "No, that's ok, you go on."

1530.94.text:
I'm just going to get myself back together,
I'll just wait for you."

1535.56.text:
So she left, and there I stood alone and I
perceive that I might be in the way, because

1541.45.text:
even though I couldn't see people exactly,
I could tell people were moving back and forth

1546.59.text:
So I step back two big steps and I stepped
over two big steps to get out of the way.

1551.44.text:
I stood there for the longest time and still
no friend.

1556.71.text:
And suddenly I was over the movie and I was
ready to engage in living, so I started greeting

1570.87.text: I didn't even know who I was talking to.

1573.52.text:
Finally after many minutes, my friend came
back and she says, "Gail.

1578.09.text: You're standing in the men's restroom!"

1595.67.text:
Maybe you don't know where you are today,
go ahead, live it big!

1599.09.text: Maybe you don't where you're headed, go ahead.

1602.33.text: And in all you do, be life!

1603.33.text:
So, so I say to each of you, may the Lord
bless you and keep you.

1634.47.text:
The Lord make His face to shine upon you and
be gracious unto you.

1638.22.text:
The Lord lift up His countenance upon you
and give you peace.

1641.08.text:
May He grant you according to you heart's
desire, and fulfill all your purpose.

1646.27.text:
May He give you increase more and more to
you and your children and may He do exceedingly,

1654.09.text:
abundantly above all that you could ask or
think according to the power that works within

1660.67.text: In Jesus' name, I love you, thanks.
